description: Not only does the Fallout Show set up some incredibly vital plot points for the franchise, but some of them are so big, that it’s hard to see how Fallout 5 and beyond could even avoid referencing the events of the series.
title: How The Fallout TV Show Shapes Fallout's Future

description: Jonathan Ferguson, a weapons expert and Keeper of Firearms & Artillery at the Royal Armouries, breaks down the guns from the Fallout TV show, including the iconic 10mm pistol, the Brotherhood of Steel’s assault rifle, the Ghoul’s rifle and revolver, and a handful of blink and you’ll miss them weapon cameos.
title: Firearms Expert Reacts to the Fallout TV Show’s Guns

description: The gorgeous action-RPG No Rest for the Wicked launched in early access on Steam this week, letting PC players experience the dark fantasy adventure's first act plus a selection of side content. The game retails for $40, but you can grab it for just $32 at Fanatical. You'll also get a free "Overwhelmingly Positive" Steam game with your order for spending over $30 during Fanatical's Level Up Sale. Alternatively, you can get No Rest for the Wicked for $31.31 at Green Man Gaming if you're an
title: Save 20% On No Rest For The Wicked, And Get A Free Game For A Limited Time
